text: The Upper Deck Company, LLC (colloquially as Upper Deck and Upper Deck Authenticated, Ltd. in the UK), founded in 1988, is a private company primarily known for producing trading cards. ==Books== *Williams, Pete. Card Sharks: How Upper Deck Turned a Child's Hobby into a High-Stakes, Billion- Dollar Business. Macmillan General Reference, May 1995. ==References== ;General *Hoover's Upper Deck Company, LLC Fact Sheet *Beckett.com company profile ;Specific ==Other websites== * Upper Deck official website * Upper Deck Entertainment website * Upper Deck Kids website * Upper Deck U website * Upper Deck International website Category:1988 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in California Category:Publishing companies of the United States
title: Upper Deck Company
